dialogue: It reminds me of Egyptian hieroglyphics.
Are you sure they didn't patent it?
Um... I don't think that's likely.
First of all, I didn't use hieroglyphics.
Secondly, the ancient Egyptians didn't have microchips.
Thirdly, they didn't have patent laws.
Oh yeah? Then how did they build the pyramids?
Do some research on that question and get back to us next week.
Why do our projects take so long?
